docs.snippet: SAN SALVADOR, Feb. 6 (AP) -- Several soccer fans were nursing bullet wounds today, unexpected victims of a soccermatch brawl that definitely got out of hand.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN SALVADOR, Feb. 6 (AP) -- Several soccer fans were nursing bullet wounds today, unexpected victims of a soccermatch brawl that definitely got out of hand.
docs.abstract: Several fans shot by police during riot, San Salvador

headline.main: Soccer Fans Shot By Police Quelling San Salvador Riot

docs.snippet: THOSE snowbound folks who were unable to get their newspapers had to nibble during a long, white week-end on what morsels were fed to them over the air waves. It made for a most unsubstantial fare. Some was totally unpalatable. One such item was...
docs.lead_paragraph: THOSE snowbound folks who were unable to get their newspapers had to nibble during a long, white week-end on what morsels were fed to them over the air waves. It made for a most unsubstantial fare. Some was totally unpalatable. One such item was found in paraphrased quotes from Bob Mathias, the Olympic decathlon champion of 1948 and 1952.

headline.main: Sports of The Times; A Long Way to Go

docs.snippet: Foreign exchange rates showed a mixed trend in fairly active dealings during the past week. British pound sterling was on the soft side while the Canadian dollar had a strong undertone.
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchange rates showed a mixed trend in fairly active dealings during the past week. British pound sterling was on the soft side while the Canadian dollar had a strong undertone.

docs.snippet: The list of the twenty-one governments that have formally agreed to take part in the New York World's Fair of 1964-65 was announced yesterday by Robert Moses, president of the fair corporation.
docs.lead_paragraph: The list of the twenty-one governments that have formally agreed to take part in the New York World's Fair of 1964-65 was announced yesterday by Robert Moses, president of the fair corporation.
docs.abstract: Moses names 24 nations who will participate; Poletti, Rosenman and other members of fair mission return from tour of Near and Mideast

headline.main: 21 PARTICIPANTS IN '64 FAIR LISTED; Names of Countries Given by Moses as Group Returns From Promotion Tour

docs.snippet: The U.S. dollar was strong against the British pound and European currencies in the foreign exchange market during the past week. Canadian dollar maintained a firm undertone in moderate dealings.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO -- The advent of jet flying in South America has opened up new tourist possibilities on this vast continent. Extra time for side-trip explorations has become available to travelers with a limited number of days or weeks for vacations...

headline.main: HIGH ROAD TO RIO; Arrival of Jet Age in South America Opens New Tourist Horizons

docs.snippet: QUARRY HEIGHTS, Canal Zone, Feb. 25 -- While a destroyer of the Colombian Navy, lying in the Pacific off a Panama beachhead, pounds shore positions early Wednesday fighter aircraft of Peru, Colombia and the United States will swoop across a target...
docs.lead_paragraph: QUARRY HEIGHTS, Canal Zone, Feb. 25 -- While a destroyer of the Colombian Navy, lying in the Pacific off a Panama beachhead, pounds shore positions early Wednesday fighter aircraft of Peru, Colombia and the United States will swoop across a target area to strafe simulated aggressor forces.
